1.content:
You stare up at the eerie building sitting up at the top of the hill, a folded piece of paper in your hand. Just the day before, you had received a strange invitation with no name signed to it. It told you to come to this place, with no other information given. You felt a little scared, but the idea of exploring a supposedly abandoned mansion sounded like a good test of courage.

With one hand, you push open the iron gates, and trek up the dirt path.

First off, who are you?
1.title: At The Gates

12.content: you are Emily a ten year old elementary student and you have received a invitation to the old mansion on the hill you arrive at the old oak doors and knock the doors then open by them self's you walk inside and the doors slam shut behind you but were do you go
12.title: Emily, age 10

122.content: Emily could smell freshly baked strawberry tarts her most beloved treat as she crept to the old kitchen door she opened it very slowly and their were the tarts bright as day since no one was their she walked up to them and had one umm yummy she thought then she heard a voice come from behind her and their was a lady who are you asked Emily why don't be scared little girl I am the duchess Ann I was the owner of this very house so your a ghost screamed Emily yes I am but you can call me Ann come have a seat and enjoy those tarts I baked them early so they were ready for you wow that is very nice said Emily then she sat down and eat 25 tarts when she had finished Emily was Hugh she could not move then Ann said would you like to spend the night here my dear oh yes if it is no trouble said Emily no trouble at all but you must promise to come here every night agreed said Ann seams fair enough ok then said Emily Ann was pleased ok come along then Emily was leaved from the chair and was take to Ann's bedchamber and she was fast asleep by the time they got their Emily was long gone Ann placed her on the bed and wanted to do something but what
122.title: the kitchen

choices: You feel as if you're being watched...
You find someting on the floor
14.content:
You are Ashley, a high school freshman.

The trek up the hill takes only a couple minutes, and you arrive at the large oak doors. "It'd be nice if someone had met me here," you mutter, staring at the intricate designs carved into the doors. "Guess it wouldn't hurt to just go in..."

You push hard on one of the doors, entering into a dark foyer, red carpeting covering the floor. A staircase sits at the end of the hall, while there are rooms off to the left and right. Turning on your flashlight, you walk further inside, not noticing the door close shut behind you.
14.title: Ashley, age 15

info.brief_description: You receive an invitation to an old mansion....
info.description:
You receive a strange invitation to come to an old mansion that supposed to be abandoned. Deciding to go anyways, you explore the mansion alone...or so you think. Beware of curious ghosts, vampire queens searching for love, hungry creatures, and all sorts of odd traps.

-Please use proper grammar!
-Please don't end the story too quickly!
-Please no graphic sexual scenes!
-Soft vore is allowed
-Have fun!
